Recipe.title: Dutch Oven Apple-Berry Crumble Cake
Recipe.Description: One morning, Ransom woke up a couple of hours early, so he went out and picked a bunch of fresh wild blackberries. When he came home he started following one recipe, until he realized it took pie filling, which we didn't have. Ransom quickly improvised, and came up with this recipe, which the entire family loved!

section.instruction: Add Eggs, and Almond Extract, then beat.
Add Flour, Salt and Baking Powder, then beat well.
Peel and core Apple, then cut apple into pieces approximately 1&inch; &by; ¼&inch; &by; ¼&inch;.
Add Apple pieces to batter and mix well.
Pour into Dutch Oven and smooth top.
Sprinkle Brown Sugar evenly over top.
Cook from top and bottom evenly until toothpick inserted comes away clean.
